item.title: Snow sleigh game on Hololens2
item.description:
Introducing our AR game circuit developed using Unity3D and MRTK3 for HoloLens 2. This project was brought to life through a collaborative effort between myself and Pauline Spinga.

Here are the key steps of the project:

Design

In designing the circuit within a ski station environment, we sourced various models from free3D, turbosquid, and sketchfab websites. Additionally, we crafted a custom panel featuring our school logo. All elements were assembled in Blender, with additional snow textures for ambiance.

item.title: 3D platform game Unity
item.description:
Introduction

After a 12-hour class at the Institut Polytechnique de Paris, where we explored the fundamentals of Unity, Pauline Spinga and I embarked on a creative project to model and develop a music-themed platform game named “Virtuoso”. In this game, players step into the shoes of Vivaldi, a character who has lost his piano and guitar and must embark on a journey through the changing seasons to recover his instruments while collecting musical notes along the way.
